DOC.brief_summary: Introduction : The life expectancy number people hit old age increase recent year . The age process accompany morphological functional change contribute reduce functional capacity , increase number fall appearance physical limitation . Exercise promote maintenance functional autonomy , improve physical ability elderly make independent . Objective : To evaluate effect program muscle strengthen exercise associate global stretching balance , fear fall functional capacity elderly woman . Methods : This non-randomized controlled trial , 12 volunteer age 60 year divide two group : intervention group ( IG , n = 7 ) submit muscle strengthen exercise stretch , 2 time per week 12 week , control group ( CG , n = 5 ) , submit protocol educate physical exercise . Before protocol evaluate score Berg Balance Scale , Falls Efficacy Scale International ( FES-I ) Evaluation Functional Autonomy Development Group Latin American Maturity ( GDLAM ) . Data statistically analyze within group significance level p < 0.05 .
DOC.brief_title: Muscle Strengthening Exercises Global Stretching Elderly
DOC.criteria: woman age 60 year , independent locomotion , ability understand verbal command perform test participation treatment program execution physical activity type physical therapy , prior neurological deficit ( stroke , traumatic brain injury , Parkinson 's disease ) musculoskeletal disease compromise performance mobility , use orthosis locomotion , inability perform evaluation test and/or participation intervention session
